name: Francis Rooney
speech: Mr. ROONEY of Florida. Madam Chairwoman, one more time, I would like  to say that the NLRB was a very important piece of legislation 70 years  ago. These little tweaks like this to update the NLRB for the modern  workforce, the volatility, the digital era, are perfectly legitimate  and logical responses to the conditions that we find ourselves in now.  We don't have carpenters who would spend their entire career at one  company anymore. They come and go at different places. It happens in  manufacturing as well. This bill would recognize that volatility and  institutionalize it in a constructive manner.  I yield back the balance of my time.
